text: Sub-Zero is a fictional character in the Mortal Kombat games for video game consoles. He has appeared as a guest fighter in Injustice 2 alongside Raiden, Hellboy and the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles. ==Portrayals== He was portrayed in games by Steve Blum and Jim Lee. Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1992 Category:Fictional characters with ice or cold abilities Category:Mortal Kombat characters
title: Sub-Zero (Mortal Kombat)
